{{dcl begin}}

{{dcl|since=c++17|
void swap( std::filesystem::path&amp; lhs, std::filesystem::path&amp; rhs ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Exchanges the state of {{c|lhs}} with that of {{c|rhs}}. Effectively calls {{c|lhs.swap(rhs)}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|paths whose states to swap}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)
